Comments
Campus security is only a call away, us feeling safe at our campus is their first priority.
Many amazing clubs and activities to choose from.
Like i said its a diverse campus any one is welcomed and im sure they will all feel at comfort.
The campus is great walking distance not too big but not too small.
Their are many sports to join and clubs as well.
The cafeteria has a variety of diverse meals that anyone can feel comfortable eating at a great price.
The academic is outstanding with a great professional staff.
Not only are they joining an amazing school, but they are making a great first step in their futures.
Irvine Valley College has a great diverse campus. Amazing organizations/clubs and a great staff. School isn't too impacted its just right.

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Sign up for classes as soon as you get your registration date. Classes fill up quickly. Get involved with clubs. Login to rate or flag the reviews Dorsa from Irvine, CA 02/16/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 56 Categories Comments Clubs and Activities there is many good club. i love one of them asec .its an engineering club.if you are engineer go for it. Great for these types of students the students of ivc aren't all the same.i guess everyone can find the people in their style. What to do for fun you can join the club,take gym,dance,...classes. Dorm Life there isn't any dorm. but there is many apartment near college that you can rent. Tips for prospective students
